name: RACESTARS
description:
I created my very own racing game using Unity. In RaceStars, I have developed the ability to control a car giving me a full arcade-style action; it has a full race AI system to challenge my competitors; you can unlock tracks over time by winning races; there are different types of cars to race against; managing audio systems; designing my own complete custom tracks and a full user interface with interactive menus. This game is for anyone who wants to make games. 

The coding that I used for the programme RaceStars was C#. I already knew the capabilities of 3D development in Unity; I developed a secure and transferrable skill in problem-solving. Gaining and learning both game development and object-oriented programming throughout this game helped a lot.

Controls: W or Up Arrow (Accelerate),  A or Left Arrow (Turn left), S or Down Arrow (Reverse), D or Right Arrow (Turn right). C is to change the camera.
